  %\VignetteIndexEntry{Yeast orphan analysis}

  %\VignetteEncoding{UTF-8}
---

```{r}

document()
library(rmonad)
con <- config()
file.symlink("../inst/yeast", "INPUT")
d <- run_fagin(con)
missues(d) %>% subset(type == "error")
e <- mtabulate(d, code=TRUE) %>% subset(error != 0)
ms <- as.list(d)
ierr <- sapply(d, function(x) x$has_error())
es <- ms[ierr]

```

```{r}
load('ARCHIVE/d1.Rda')
d1 %>>% secondary_data(con=con) -> d
missues(d) %>% subset(type == "error")
e <- mtabulate(d, code=TRUE) %>% subset(error != 0)

es <- ms[ierr]
```
